summary: SkyMute collects minimal personal data via Google login for link box creation and sharing. Users create public boxes accessible by 3-digit codes that may be indexed by search engines. Sexual content is allowed only when explicitly marked NSFW and age restrictions are followed. We do not sell user data and respect user rights to access and delete their content.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.description: We collect only the data necessary to operate the App, provide core features, improve functionality, and maintain a safe environment.

metadata: Date and time of box creation
Number of links in a box
voluntarilyProvided.note: We do not access your password or post on your behalf. You control the content within your boxes.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
purposes: To create and manage link boxes

sections.title: Public Content and Sharing
sections.description: Link boxes are public and shareable via 3-digit codes. These may be indexed by search engines.
userControl: Delete boxes (note: search engine caches may persist)

sections.responsibility: Users are responsible for content they share.

conditions: Clearly mark NSFW in box name or bio
Use filters or age-gates to restrict visibility

prohibitedContent: Violent content unsuitable for general audiences

sections.note: While we strive for security, no system is 100% safe. Share responsibly.
